001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.BLACK_FG;
004import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.BLUE_FG;
005import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.BOLD;
006import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.CYAN_FG;
007import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.DEFAULT_FG;
008import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.GREEN_FG;
009import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.MAGENTA_FG;
010import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.RED_FG;
011import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.WHITE_FG;
012import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.ANSIConstants.YELLOW_FG;
013
014import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
015import java.time.ZoneId;
016import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
017import java.util.Locale;
018
019import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
020
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent;
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEvent.Caller;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter;
024import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.EventFormatter;
025import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.Padding;
026import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.PatternKeyword;
027import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternFormatterFactory.CompositeFactory;
028import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternFormatterFactory.KeywordFactory;
029
030/**
031 * Creates formatters from pattern keywords and are registered to a
032 * {@link PatternRegistry}.
033 */
034public sealed interface PatternFormatterFactory {
035
036        /**
037         * A composite formatter factory expects possible children. For example
038         * {@code %keyword(child) }.
039         */
040        public non-sealed interface CompositeFactory extends PatternFormatterFactory {
041
042                /**
043                 * Creates a formatter from a keyword.
044                 * @param config config to help create formatter.
045                 * @param node current keyword info.
046                 * @param child the embedded child in the keyword or null if non is provided.
047                 * @return formatter.
048                 */
049                public LogFormatter create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child);
050
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * A keyword formatter factory expects keywords and option list. It is usually in the
055         * format of {@code %keyword}.
056         */
057        public non-sealed interface KeywordFactory extends PatternFormatterFactory {
058
059                /**
060                 * Creates a formatter from a keyword.
061                 * @param config config to help create formatter.
062                 * @param node current keyword info.
063                 * @return formatter.
064                 */
065                public LogFormatter create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node);
066
067                /**
068                 * Creates a keyword factory from a formatter that only cares about padding info.
069                 * @param formatter existing formatter.
070                 * @return factory.
071                 */
072                static PatternFormatterFactory.KeywordFactory of(LogFormatter formatter) {
073                        return (c, n) -> PadFormatter.of(formatter, n.padding());
074                }
075
076        }
077
078}
079
080enum CallerInfoFormatter implements EventFormatter {
081
082        METHOD() {
083
084                @Override
085                protected void format(StringBuilder output, Caller info) {
086                        output.append(info.methodName());
087                }
088
089        },
090        CLASS {
091                @Override
092                protected void format(StringBuilder output, Caller info) {
093                        output.append(info.className());
094
095                }
096        },
097        FILE {
098                @Override
099                protected void format(StringBuilder output, Caller info) {
100                        output.append(info.fileNameOrNull());
101
102                }
103        },
104        LINE {
105                @Override
106                protected void format(StringBuilder output, Caller info) {
107                        output.append(info.lineNumber());
108
109                }
110        };
111
112        @Override
113        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event) {
114                var info = event.callerOrNull();
115                if (info != null) {
116                        format(output, info);
117                }
118
119        }
120
121        protected abstract void format(StringBuilder output, Caller caller);
122
123}
124
125enum StandardKeywordFactory implements KeywordFactory {
126
127        DATE() {
128                @Override
129                protected LogFormatter _create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node) {
130                        String pattern = node.opt(0, ISO8601_PATTERN);
131                        if (pattern.equals(ISO8601_STR)) {
132                                pattern = ISO8601_PATTERN;
133                        }
134                        ZoneId zoneId = node.opt(1, config.zoneId(), s -> ZoneId.of(s));
135                        @Nullable
136                        Locale locale = node.optOrNull(2, s -> Locale.forLanguageTag(s));
137                        var dtf = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(pattern).withZone(zoneId);
138                        if (locale != null) {
139                                dtf = dtf.withLocale(locale);
140                        }
141                        return LogFormatter.TimestampFormatter.of(dtf);
142                }
143        },
144        LOGGER() {
145
146                @Override
147                protected LogFormatter _create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node) {
148                        Integer length = node.optOrNull(0, Integer::parseInt);
149                        if (length == null) {
150                                return LogFormatter.NameFormatter.of();
151                        }
152                        return new LoggerFormatter(Abbreviator.of(length));
153                }
154
155        };
156
157        static final String ISO8601_STR = "ISO8601";
158
159        static final String ISO8601_PATTERN = "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss,SSS";
160
161        // MICROS, //
162        // THREAD, //
163        // LEVEL, //
164        // LOGGER, //
165        // MESSAGE, //
166        // MDC, //
167        // THROWABLE, //
168        // LINESEP;
169
170        @Override
171        public LogFormatter create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node) {
172                var formatter = _create(config, node);
173                var formatInfo = node.padding();
174                return PadFormatter.of(formatter, formatInfo);
175        }
176
177        protected abstract LogFormatter _create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node);
178
179        record LoggerFormatter(Abbreviator abbreviator) implements LogFormatter.NameFormatter {
180
181                @Override
182                public void formatName(StringBuilder output, String name) {
183                        String out = abbreviator.abbreviate(name);
184                        output.append(out);
185                }
186
187        }
188
189}
190
191enum BareCompositeFactory implements CompositeFactory {
192
193        BARE() {
194                @Override
195                public LogFormatter create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
196                        if (child == null) {
197                                child = new LogFormatter.StaticFormatter("");
198                        }
199                        return PadFormatter.of(child, node.padding());
200                }
201        };
202
203}
204
205class ANSIConstants {
206
207        final static String ESC_START = "\033[";
208
209        final static String ESC_END = "m";
210
211        final static String BOLD = "1;";
212
213        final static String RESET = "0;";
214
215        final static String BLACK_FG = "30";
216
217        final static String RED_FG = "31";
218
219        final static String GREEN_FG = "32";
220
221        final static String YELLOW_FG = "33";
222
223        final static String BLUE_FG = "34";
224
225        final static String MAGENTA_FG = "35";
226
227        final static String CYAN_FG = "36";
228
229        final static String WHITE_FG = "37";
230
231        final static String DEFAULT_FG = "39";
232
233        final static String SET_DEFAULT_COLOR = ESC_START + RESET + DEFAULT_FG + ESC_END;
234
235}
236
237record HighlightFormatter(@Nullable LogFormatter child) implements LogFormatter.EventFormatter {
238
239        @Override
240        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event) {
241                /*
242                 * TODO should a null child be a noop? Need to see what logback does for compat.
243                 */
244                var level = event.level();
245                String code = levelToANSI(level);
246                output.append(ANSIConstants.ESC_START);
247                output.append(code);
248                output.append(ANSIConstants.ESC_END);
249                if (child != null) {
250                        child.format(output, event);
251                }
252                output.append(ANSIConstants.SET_DEFAULT_COLOR);
253        }
254
255        private static String levelToANSI(Level level) {
256                return switch (level) {
257                        case ERROR -> BOLD + RED_FG;
258                        case WARNING -> BOLD + RED_FG;
259                        case INFO -> BLUE_FG;
260                        default -> DEFAULT_FG;
261                };
262        }
263
264}
265
266enum HightlightCompositeFactory implements CompositeFactory {
267
268        HIGHTLIGHT() {
269
270                @Override
271                public LogFormatter create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
272                        if (config.ansiDisabled()) {
273                                if (child == null) {
274                                        return LogFormatter.noop();
275                                }
276                                return child;
277                        }
278                        return new HighlightFormatter(child);
279                }
280
281        }
282
283}
284
285enum ColorCompositeFactory implements CompositeFactory {
286
287        BLACK(BLACK_FG, "black"), //
288        RED(RED_FG, "red"), //
289        GREEN(GREEN_FG, "green"), //
290        YELLOW(YELLOW_FG, "yellow"), //
291        BLUE(BLUE_FG, "blue"), //
292        MAGENTA(MAGENTA_FG, "magenta"), //
293        CYAN(CYAN_FG, "cyan"), //
294        WHITE(WHITE_FG, "white"), //
295        GRAY(DEFAULT_FG, "gray"), //
296        BOLD_RED(BOLD + RED_FG, "boldRed"), //
297        BOLD_GREEN(BOLD + GREEN_FG, "boldGreen"), //
298        BOLD_YELLOW(BOLD + YELLOW_FG, "boldYellow"), //
299        BOLD_BLUE(BOLD + BLUE_FG, "boldBlue"), //
300        BOLD_MAGENTA(BOLD + MAGENTA_FG, "boldMagenta"), //
301        BOLD_CYAN(BOLD + CYAN_FG, "boldCyan"), //
302        BOLD_WHITE(BOLD + WHITE_FG, "boldWhite");
303
304        private final String fg;
305
306        private final String name;
307
308        private ColorCompositeFactory(String fg, String name) {
309                this.fg = fg;
310                this.name = name;
311        }
312
313        public LogFormatter create(PatternConfig config, PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child) {
314                return create(node, child, !config.ansiDisabled());
315        }
316
317        LogFormatter create(PatternKeyword node, @Nullable LogFormatter child, boolean ansi) {
318                var b = LogFormatter.builder();
319                if (ansi) {
320                        b.text(ANSIConstants.ESC_START);
321                }
322                b.text(fg);
323                if (ansi) {
324                        b.text(ANSIConstants.ESC_END);
325                }
326                if (child != null) {
327                        b.add(child);
328                }
329                if (ansi) {
330                        b.text(ANSIConstants.SET_DEFAULT_COLOR);
331                }
332                return b.flatten();
333
334        }
335
336        public String alias() {
337                return name;
338        }
339
340}
341
342record PadFormatter(Padding padding, LogFormatter formatter) implements LogFormatter.EventFormatter {
343
344        public static LogFormatter of(LogFormatter formatter, @Nullable Padding padding) {
345                if (padding == null) {
346                        return formatter;
347                }
348                if (formatter instanceof LogFormatter.StaticFormatter sf) {
349                        StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder();
350                        padding.format(b, sf.content());
351                        return new LogFormatter.StaticFormatter(b.toString());
352                }
353                return new PadFormatter(padding, formatter);
354        }
355
356        @Override
357        public void format(StringBuilder output, LogEvent event) {
358                StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
359                formatter.format(buf, event);
360                padding.format(output, buf);
361        }
362
363}
